attributes.action: Pedestrianize central London except for electric buses,taxis & the emergancy services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban all vehicles from central London (& other busy cities) with the exceptions of: Electric buses & taxis, emergency vehicles & perhaps provide cycles or paycard activated personal electric vehicles.
Allow for deliveries between only 12midnight & 6am.
& set a world environmental president as a legacy.
